mapper.select: SELECT e.est_id AS est_id, e.est_reg_date AS est_reg_date, e.est_tra_com_date AS est_tra_com_date, e.est_type AS est_type, e.est_tra_type AS est_tra_type, e.est_tra_cond AS est_tra_cond, e.est_monthpay AS est_monthpay, e.est_manage AS est_manage, e.est_addr AS est_addr, e.est_lati AS est_lati, e.est_longi AS est_longi, e.est_direc AS est_direc, e.est_usage AS est_usage, e.est_m_area AS est_m_area, e.est_t_area AS est_t_area, e.est_t_floor AS est_t_floor, e.est_m_floor AS est_m_floor, e.est_elev_num AS est_elev_num, e.est_room_num AS est_room_num, e.est_bath_num AS est_bath_num, e.est_gara_num AS est_gara_num, e.est_gumsa AS est_gumsa, e.est_sungin AS est_sungin, e.est_jungong AS est_jungong, a.agent_num AS agent_num, a.user_id AS user_id, a.agent_office AS agent_office, a.agent_reg_num AS agent_reg_num, a.agent_tel AS agent_tel, a.agent_name AS agent_name, a.agent_addr AS agent_addr, a.agent_rfname AS agent_rfname, a.agent_fname AS agent_fname, a.agent_reg_state AS agent_reg_state FROM estate_tb e LEFT JOIN agent_tb a ON e.agent_num = a.agent_num

SELECT e.est_id, a.agent_name, COUNT(c.est_id) AS accuse_count FROM estate_tb e LEFT JOIN agent_tb a ON e.agent_num = a.agent_num LEFT JOIN complain_tb c ON e.est_id = c.est_id GROUP BY e.est_id, a.agent_name
SELECT r.dis_num AS dis_num, r.est_id AS est_id, rs.rapid_item AS rapid_item, r.dis_price AS dis_price, r.dis_date AS dis_date FROM rapid_tb r JOIN rapid_set_tb rs ON r.rapid_num = rs.rapid_num

SELECT e.est_id AS est_id, e.est_reg_date AS est_reg_date, e.est_tra_com_date AS est_tra_com_date, e.est_type AS est_type, e.est_tra_type AS est_tra_type, e.est_tra_cond AS est_tra_cond, e.est_monthpay AS est_monthpay, e.est_manage AS est_manage, e.est_addr AS est_addr, e.est_lati AS est_lati, e.est_longi AS est_longi, e.est_direc AS est_direc, e.est_usage AS est_usage, e.est_m_area AS est_m_area, e.est_t_area AS est_t_area, e.est_t_floor AS est_t_floor, e.est_m_floor AS est_m_floor, e.est_elev_num AS est_elev_num, e.est_room_num AS est_room_num, e.est_bath_num AS est_bath_num, e.est_gara_num AS est_gara_num, e.est_gumsa AS est_gumsa, e.est_sungin AS est_sungin, e.est_jungong AS est_jungong, a.agent_num AS agent_num, a.user_id AS user_id, a.agent_office AS agent_office, a.agent_reg_num AS agent_reg_num, a.agent_tel AS agent_tel, a.agent_name AS agent_name, a.agent_addr AS agent_addr, a.agent_rfname AS agent_rfname, a.agent_fname AS agent_fname, a.agent_reg_state AS agent_reg_state FROM estate_tb e LEFT JOIN agent_tb a ON e.agent_num = a.agent_num WHERE e.est_id = #{id}
